name: Intangible
description:
You look around you and see animals wandering around on their feet. You look under you, and all you see is the floor. Are you actually there? If it wasnâ€™t for the sword you are holding, would you actually exist?
 
If both your hands are empty, you will become invisible and phase through blocks except if those blocks are Soul sand, Soul soil, Obsidian, Bedrock and Barrier blocks. This will also increase your [Nostalgia]. While inside blocks, hold spacebar to quickly ascend and hold shift to quickly descend..
